description: Application for the approval of Reserved Matters detailing the Appearance of the buildings units 30 to 36 only pursuant to Condition 2 of outline planning permission ref. 163348OUT dated 22.12.2017 for "Construction of three buildings with basement levels (five storeys, four storeys, and twostoreys in height) for the provision at Unit 25 of flexible light industrial (B1c Use Class) andgeneral industrial uses (B2 Use Class) on the basement and ground floor levels, and offices(B1a Use Class) at first floor level; storage and/or distribution uses (B8 Use Class) for Units 28,30, 31, 35 and 36; broadcast and film equipment storage and hire (Sui Generis) at Unit 32; and offices (B1a Use Class) at Units 33 and 34"
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing titles: Location Plan; 1244/PL/A10; 1244/PL/A11; 1244/PL/A207; 1244/PL/A220; 1244/PL/A221; 1244/PL/A222; and 1244/PL/A223.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
